text: Ra jaba timiche'u yasta manisaharu a'umchan jasale hamra ayataharuma visvasa gardachan ta tiniharusita (tiniharuko bhala'iko lagi) salamuna, alaikuma bhandai gara. Allahale aphumathi krpagarnu anivarya garihaleko cha. Yadi timiharumadhye kasaile ajnanata vasa kunai duskarma garihaleko cha ra pachi prayascita garihalyo ra aphno acarana sudhara garihalyo bhane allaha thulo muktidata ra atyanta dayavana cha
